# Get-TeamInfo

## SYNOPSIS
Displays your current account and default project.

## SYNTAX

### Parameter Set 1
```
Get-TeamInfo
```

## DESCRIPTION


## EXAMPLES

### -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
PS C:\\\>
```powershell
Get-TeamInfo
```

This will display your current account and default project
